definitions.definition: To stimulate one's own genitals for sexual pleasure, either manually or with an object.
In medical or psychological contexts, to engage in self-stimulation as a form of sexual activity.

etymology.historicalDevelopment: 源自拉丁语 'masturbare'，最初可能带有贬义，意为'用手玷污'，在18世纪传入英语时，主要用于医学和性学讨论中。随着社会态度的演变，该词在现代英语中逐渐成为中性或教育性的术语，用于性教育而非污名化。
etymology.firstKnownUse: Around 1712 in English, as recorded in medical texts
